snippet.title: [XDRV] EX-XDRiVER Public Announcement
snippet.description:
Welcome to EX-XDRiVER, a hybrid rhythm-racing game being developed for PC. Please enjoy.

LINK TO COMMUNITY DISCORD SERVER:
https://discord.gg/Sucp6JeFzN

LINK TO OFFICIAL TWITTER ACCOUNT:
https://twitter.com/exdrv

----

Hello everyone, my name is Riley, and on behalf of the XDRV development team, I'd like to present what we've had in the works for several months now: EX-XDRiVER.
For people that have known me previously, you may know that I have had the ideas and concepts created for this game since 2020---but our team was only pulled together in December of 2022! Since then, we've made incredible progress in turning those ideas from a proof of concept to a working prototype. 

With a fast-paced, bright, and energetic neon theme, and incredibly hard-hitting electronic music, EX-XDRiVER combines the steering and controls of racing games with the precision and dynamic movement of arcade rhythm games. Flurries of note patterns with anything-goes effecting---combined with a drifting mechanic that rewards you for following the course---will keep you pushing for faster course clear times and higher scores.

We hope you enjoy this announcement teaser for our project, and get amped up for future news as this project develops!

Please check above for links to our associated social media pages/boards!

----

TEAM XDRV

Riley  |  Project Lead, Lead Design, Sound Director, Backup Programming
tari  |  Developer, Programming, Game Design, Charting
Yokamaa  |  Developer, Programming, Visual Design, Music

Special thanks to the individuals whose names are listed at the end of the video, I appreciate you all so, so much for your invested interest and contributions to this project. 

💜
